issue.title: [Documentation] docs/requirements.txt is out-of-sync with what CI builds use
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13354](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13354). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
docs/requirements.txt pins Sphinx 2.4.4 but the CI pipelines use the latest versions of breathe/sphinx/etc.
